Machine Learning.title: Predictive Analysis for Stock Trading
Machine Learning.description: A machine learning project where you predict stock prices using historical data. The predictions can be used for trading stocks.
Machine Learning.portfolio_impact: This project showcases the ability to apply machine learning techniques to real world financial data, a highly valuable skill in many industries.

Machine Learning.title: Image Recognition System
Machine Learning.description: A machine learning project to identify objects in images. Can be used for cataloging images, self-driving cars, or surveillance systems.
Machine Learning.portfolio_impact: Image recognition is a hot topic in AI sector, showcasing your proficiency in this field can make you stand out.
bonus_challenges: Identify multiple objects in one image

Machine Learning.title: Sentiment Analysis Chatbot
Machine Learning.description: A simple chatbot that can analyze emotions in text messages. Can be used in customer service to identify unhappy customers.
Machine Learning.portfolio_impact: This project demonstrates practical application of NLP and ML, which are in high demand due to increasing use of chatbots in customer service.
bonus_challenges: Improve bot responses based on sentiment

React.js.title: Interactive Dashboard
React.js.description: A dynamic and interactive dashboard that visualizes data. Can be used for business intelligence, analytics, or project management.
React.js.portfolio_impact: Interactive dashboards are common in many industries, demonstrating your ability to create one will showcase versatility and attention to user experience.

React.js.title: E-commerce App
React.js.description: A full-featured e-commerce app where users can browse products, add them to their cart, and make purchases.
React.js.portfolio_impact: E-commerce apps are complex and ubiquitous, handling such a project will demonstrate your ability to work on large scale applications.
bonus_challenges: Recommendation system based on user's purchase history

React.js.title: Task Manager
React.js.description: A simple task manager where users can create, update, delete and prioritize tasks.
React.js.portfolio_impact: This project allows you to highlight your understanding of basic CRUD operations and your ability to create an intuitive UI.

Docker.title: Continuous Integration Pipeline
Docker.description: A CI/CD pipeline that automatically tests and deploys code using Docker and Jenkins.
Docker.portfolio_impact: DevOps skills are in high demand. Demonstrating your ability to automate testing and deployment using Docker will be highly attractive to employers.

Docker.title: Multi-Container App Deployment
Docker.description: An application that uses multiple containers to separate different services of the application.
Docker.portfolio_impact: This project shows your ability to design and implement a modern microservices architecture using Docker, which is an important skill for cloud-native development.

Docker.title: Dockerized Development Environment
Docker.description: A fully dockerized development environment for a simple web application. This will eliminate the 'it works on my machine' problem.
Docker.portfolio_impact: This project demonstrates your understanding of Docker's role in creating consistent development environments, an important aspect of DevOps.
